Statement.message1: Ah hello there lad. Inspector Lavigeur told me he'd send over some assistance. Peckham isn't it?

Response.message: It's George, sir. George Peckham

Statement.message: Aren't you a little bit young for a Police Detective?

Response.message: Actually sir, Inspector Lavigeur thought to keep the regulars out of this matter

Statement.message: A good idea, young man. Lavigeur's more astute than he looks. Now, to business!'

Response.message: What are we investigating, sir?

Statement.message: This is the laboratory and study of one Rothwell Ruskin-Horton II, inventor, alchemist and philosopher. Eight days ago he contacted me, he described making some breakthrough in the sciences, but did not elaborate any further. No one has heard anything from him since... The Inspector suspects foul play. And its up to us to find him.'
